item.title: LME将在镍危机后改革中三度明确资本需求
item.description: 伦敦金属交易所的清算所计划将会员的资本要求提高两倍，这是两年多前镍空头危机后旨在加强市场的最新改革。【原文：The London Metal Exchange’s clearing house plans to triple capital requirements for members in the latest reform aimed at strengthening the market following the nickel short-squeeze crisis more than two years ago.】

item.title: Dynamite 集团 "精明 "的首次公开募股将启动更多加拿大交易
item.description: Groupe Dynamite 公司在经历了 18 个月的枯竭期后，准备唤醒加拿大沉寂已久的首次公开募股市场，银行家们称这是一次时机巧妙的募股，预计将成为加拿大近三年来最大的首次公开募股。【原文：Groupe Dynamite Inc. is poised to awaken Canada’s long-dormant initial public offering market after an 18-month dry spell, in what bankers are calling a cunningly timed offering that is expected to be the country’s biggest debut in nearly three years.】

item.title: 尼日利亚计划发行 17 亿美元欧洲债券为 2025 年预算融资
item.description: 尼日利亚财政部长瓦莱-埃顿（Wale Edun）表示，尼日利亚计划发行欧元债券和伊斯兰债券，以帮助为其 2025 年预算融资。【原文：Nigeria plans to issue eurobonds and Islamic sukuk bonds to help finance its 2025 budget, according to Finance Minister Wale Edun.】

item.title: 艾德-奥特曼称私人信贷已打破垃圾债券晴雨表
item.description: 一位花了几十年时间研究垃圾债务和不良债务的教授说，私人信贷的兴起产生了一个令人惊讶的副作用：它使其他高收益市场上的公司借贷变得更便宜，而且很可能使信贷风险的一个关键晴雨表变得不那么准确。【原文：The rise of private credit has had a surprising side effect: it’s made borrowing cheaper for companies in other high-yield markets, and has probably made a key barometer of credit risk less accurate, according to a professor who has spent decades studying junk and distressed debt.】

item.title: 恶劣天气影响葡萄生长，欧洲葡萄酒收成进一步减少
item.description: 在需求疲软的情况下，恶劣的天气侵袭了主要生产国的葡萄园，导致欧洲葡萄酒收成连年下降。【原文：Europe’s wine harvest declined for another year as adverse weather battered vineyards in top producers amid weakening demand.】

item.title: 埃尔-埃里安称欧洲 "丑陋 "经济可能导致欧元走低
item.description: 穆罕默德-埃尔-埃里安（Mohamed El-Erian）认为，美国和欧洲之间不断扩大的经济差距有可能进一步拖累共同货币和欧洲债务。【原文：A growing economic gap between the US and Europe threatens to further weigh on the common currency and European debt, according to Mohamed El-Erian.】

item.title: 部长恩库贝说：尽管遭遇旱灾，津巴布韦经济仍有活力
item.description: 津巴布韦财政部长姆图利-恩库比（Mthuli Ncube）表示，尽管该国不得不与肆虐的干旱作斗争，而且自 1999 年债务违约以来一直被资本市场所回避，但该国的经济命运正在好转。【原文：Zimbabwe‘s economic fortunes are looking up, despite the nation having to contend with a crippling drought and being shunned by capital markets since a 1999 debt default, Finance Minister Mthuli Ncube said.】

item.title: 乌克兰最大移动运营商的所有者呼吁结束战争
item.description: 乌克兰最大移动运营商的母公司呼吁结束战争，指出俄罗斯持续入侵造成的人员伤亡不断上升。【原文：The parent company of Ukraine’s largest mobile provider called for an end to the war, pointing to the spiraling human cost of Russia’s ongoing invasion.】

item.title: 新兴市场货币剧烈波动，Pimco质疑外汇制度
item.description: 发展中国家近期的货币波动促使最大的新兴市场投资者之一太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：Recent bouts of currency volatility in the developing world have prompted Pacific Investment Management Co., one of the largest emerging-market investors, to question the efficacy of a floating exchange rate regime.】

item.title: 高盛代理西班牙瓦伦西亚足球俱乐部再融资交易
item.description: 瓦伦西亚足球俱乐部（Valencia CF）已达成债务再融资协议，为西班牙足球队在 2030 年世界杯之前筹集资金建造新球场铺平了道路。【原文：Valencia CF has reached an agreement to refinance its debt, paving the way for the Spanish football team to raise funds for a new stadium ahead of the 2030 FIFA World Cup.】

item.title: 洋葱》收购亚历克斯-琼斯的《Infowars》，桑迪胡克家庭提供支持
item.description: 讽刺新闻网站洋葱（The Onion）背后的实体与桑迪胡克小学枪击案遇难者家属一起，准备收购右翼挑衅者亚历克斯-琼斯（Alex Jones）的 Infowars 网站。【原文：The entity behind the satirical news site The Onion, along with families of the Sandy Hook Elementary School shooting victims, are on tap to purchase right-wing provocateur Alex Jones’ Infowars website.】

item.title: 美国货币市场基金资产首次突破 7 万亿美元
item.description: 美国货币市场基金目前管理着超过 7 万亿美元的资产，这是一个具有里程碑意义的行业，由于收益率高且可靠，它在投资者中的受欢迎程度直线上升。【原文：US money-market funds now have more than $7 trillion in assets under management, a milestone for an industry that’s skyrocketed in popularity among investors thanks to lofty and dependable yields.】

item.title: 斯洛伐克寻求延长对俄罗斯原油制裁的豁免期限
item.description: 斯洛伐克外交部长尤拉伊-布拉纳尔表示，斯洛伐克计划与欧盟就延长对俄罗斯石油制裁的豁免期限举行会谈。【原文：Slovakia plans to hold talks with the European Union about extending its exemption to sanctions on Russian oil, according to Foreign Minister Juraj Blanar.】

item.title: 特朗普誓言采取新举措，詹斯勒就加密货币规则提出最后建议
item.description: 加里-根斯勒（Gary Gensler）在即将上任的特朗普政府及其对数字资产的热情之前，就美国证券交易委员会（SEC）应如何监管加密货币市场提出了最后的建议。【原文：Gary Gensler is making a final pitch for how the SEC should be allowed to regulate cryptocurrency markets ahead of the incoming Trump administration and its enthusiasm for digital assets.】

item.title: 赞比亚加息无法使克瓦查免受强势美元和干旱的影响
item.description: 赞比亚银行周三的利率上调几乎没有减缓克瓦查的跌势，该货币兑美元汇率跌至历史新低。【原文：Wednesday’s Bank of Zambia interest-rate increase has barely slowed the kwacha’s slide, with the currency sinking to a fresh record low against the dollar.】

item.title: 沙特基金 10 亿美元交易推动中东地区抛售潮蓬勃发展
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯最大的移动电话运营商出售了 10 亿美元的股份，这是中东后续股票发行市场回暖的最新迹象。【原文：A $1 billion stake sale in Saudi Arabia’s largest mobile phone operator is the latest sign that the market for follow-on equity offerings is picking up in the Middle East.】

item.title: 英国央行行长曼称英国经济将受到全球贸易紧张局势的冲击
item.description: 英国央行利率制定者凯瑟琳-曼警告说，唐纳德-特朗普引发的全球贸易战所带来的冲击波将打击英国的经济增长和通货膨胀。【原文：Bank of England rate-setter Catherine Mann warned that shockwaves from a global trade war sparked by Donald Trump would hit UK growth and inflation.】

item.title: 奥地利准备结束对俄罗斯天然气长达六十年的依赖
item.description: 随着 OMV AG 公司执行对俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom PJSC）的裁决，奥地利正准备让莫斯科关闭让俄罗斯天然气畅通了半个多世纪的水龙头。【原文：Austria is preparing for Moscow to turn off the taps that kept Russian gas flowing for more than a half century, as OMV AG enforces a ruling against Gazprom PJSC.】

item.title: 美国上周初请失业金人数降至五月以来最低
item.description: 上周，美国失业救济金申请降至 5 月份以来的最低水平，这表明在经历了近期的风暴和罢工之后，美国对工人的需求仍然健康。【原文：Applications for US unemployment benefits fell to the lowest level since May last week, signaling there is still a healthy demand for workers after recent storms and strikes.】

item.title: 美国生产者价格上涨，美联储青睐的指标面临压力风险
item.description: 美国生产者价格在 10 月份有所回升，部分原因是投资组合管理和其他类别的价格上涨，而这正是美联储首选的通胀指标。【原文：US producer prices picked up in October, fueled in part by gains in portfolio management and other categories that feed into the Federal Reserve’s preferred inflation gauge.】

item.title: S&P认为莫桑比克的动乱使该国更接近债务违约
item.description: 据S&P全球评级公司（S&P Global Ratings）称，自上个月有争议的大选以来，莫桑比克发生了震惊该国经济的致命抗议活动，这使得该国政府无力偿还内债的本已很高的风险进一步上升。【原文：Deadly protests that have rocked Mozambique’s economy since disputed elections last month are ratcheting up already high risks that the government will be unable to service its domestic debt, according to S&P Global Ratings.】

item.title: Meta 因滥用分类广告优势被欧盟罚款 7.98 亿欧元
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司因将其 Facebook Marketplace 服务与其庞大的社交网络捆绑在一起而被欧盟监管机构处以 7.98 亿欧元（8.41 亿美元）的罚款，这是该美国科技巨头首次因违反欧盟反垄断法而受到处罚。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. was hit with a €798 million ($841 million) fine by European Union regulators by tying its Facebook Marketplace service to its sprawling social network, the US tech giant’s first ever penalty for EU antitrust violations.】

item.title: 中国铜买家削减年度合同，市场处于波动之中
item.description: 铜曾是全球金属市场的风向标，而中国的铜进口商们正在通过年度供应谈判来控制他们的购买吨数，转而选择现货供应。【原文：China’s copper importers are reining in the amount of tonnage they buy through annual supply negotiations, once a bellwether for the global metal market, and opting for spot supplies instead.】

item.title: 印度央行行长任期未定，降息希望渺茫
item.description: 印度央行行长的合同还有不到一个月就将结束，其未来的不确定性给利率预期增添了另一层复杂性。【原文：Uncertainty about the future of India’s central bank governor, whose contract ends in less than a month, is adding another layer of complexity to interest rate expectations.】

item.title: 来自利马亚太经合组织首席执行官峰会的最新消息
item.description: 11月11日，在秘鲁利马，人们从利马会议中心入口处走过，参加亚太经济合作组织峰会。摄影师：Cris Bouroncle/法新社/盖蒂图片社【原文：People walk by the entrance of the Lima Convention Center for the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation Summit in Lima, Peru, on Nov. 11. Photographer: Cris Bouroncle/AFP/Getty Images】

item.title: 石油需求增长将进一步下滑
item.description:
欧佩克再次下调了预期，但仍比国际能源署乐观得多。【原文：

OPEC has again trimmed estimates, yet it’s still much more optimistic than the IEA.

】

item.title: 淘金者围观被富人遗弃的芝加哥豪宅
item.description: 当肯-格里芬离开芝加哥时，这位亿万富翁金融家留下了价值 9,400 万美元的豪华公寓和顶层公寓，这些公寓和顶层公寓曾一度打破价格记录，彰显了他城中首富的地位。【原文：When Ken Griffin decamped from Chicago, the billionaire financier left behind $94 million in ritzy condos and penthouses that once shattered price records and trumpeted his status as the richest man in town.】

item.title: Tapestry 正在回购为收购 Capri 而发行的债券
item.description: Tapestry Inc. 因反垄断压力而放弃收购 Capri Holdings，并计划回购 61 亿美元的债券，以资助现已受阻的收购。【原文：Tapestry Inc. is planning to buy back $6.1 billion of bonds it sold to fund its now blocked purchase of Capri Holdings, after abandoning the deal due to antitrust pressure.】

item.title: 欧洲央行官员认为风险管理是 10 月降息的关键
item.description: 欧洲中央银行上个月决定提前降息的一个重要原因是风险管理方面的考虑。【原文：Risk-management considerations were a key reason the European Central Bank decided to bring forward an interest-rate cut last month, an account of their last policy decision showed.】

item.title: 与马斯克一样，钾肥公司 K+S 也因德国工人生病而陷入困境
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克并不是唯一一个注意到德国员工请病假比平时多的人。【原文：Elon Musk isn’t the only one noticing that staff in Germany are calling in sick more than usual.】
